text: I have fond memories of this game, I bought it when it released and I liked the banana yellow cart. I remember having a hard time in one of the cloud levels, but it's been way too long since I played it. This was at a time when I used to buy and rent games based on their box arts, I got lucky sometimes with actual great games like this or Earthbound (I had to get that giant box).
author: SupraDarky
